name: Shashi Kant
about: A Computer Science Engineering Final Year student & aspiring Software Developer with good problem-solving skills. Able to perform well in a team. Passionate about coding and equipped with a diverse and promising skill-set, placing a special emphasis on writing good quality code. You can track my projects on GITHUB.

projects.details: Here are the some of my projects. Git Hub links of all the projects are mentioned with them. These projects are completely build from scratch.

items.name: Homzy & Homzy Provider
items.tagline: [Flutter, API, Payments, OTP Login, ChatBot, Firebase]
items.details: These are two different apps for user and provider. Basically It is a home service app which act as a intermediater between the user and provider. It helps us in daily household Services  to book without much efforts like Electrician, Plumber, Salon etc. We have integrated with a Chat Bot available 24*7 for our service. In android devices we can also make payments with the help of UPI. It consists of  One click OTP login functionality. If possible I will take this app to the next Level in future.

items.name: Flash Chat app
items.details: This is a group chatting app like whatsapp. This is for the beginer level Developers.

items.name: Weather Forecasting
items.details: This App give you weather of your Current Location as well as you can enter any city to check weather of that.

items.name: Cryptotracker
items.details: This is a crypto Currency price tracking app in which we can track the price of cryptoCurrency in the real time. It fetches the result with the help of API.
